title: New: NO – What’s Your Name / Eleven Eleven
content:
Since appearing last year with their fantastic debut EP Don’t Worry, You’ll Be Here Forever, Echo Park six piece NO have gathered quite a fanbase, both in their home country and across the pond in the UK.

Now nearly a year on from the release of said EP, they group have returned with a 7″ featuring two new tracks; What’s Your Name and Eleven Eleven. Continuing in their ‘post-hymnal’ vein, both are gloriously cinematic – (‘light up the hills with candles, they’re watching us from space’). These are songs made to be played to thousands of screaming fans at the world’s biggest festivals, and it’s only a matter of time before NO take to that stage.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
